description: Create a PNP transistor with SiGe heterojunction base, 20% germanium content, for high-frequency analog applications. Include Gummel plot analysis and transit frequency measurement.
generated_code:
.MODEL pnp NPN
+ IS=1e-16 BF=100 BR=1 VAF=100 VAR=10

.TRAN 1n 1u
.PROBE DC I(VCE) I(VBE)

.END

description: Create a PIN diode with 50μm intrinsic region width, heavily doped p+ and n+ regions (1e20 cm⁻³), for high-frequency switching applications. Analyze carrier lifetime and reverse recovery time.
generated_code:
VIN vin 0 DC 3.3

.AC DEC 10 1K 10G

.PROBE DC V(vin)
.END

description: Design a MEMS accelerometer with proof mass (500μm × 500μm), capacitive sensing with 2μm gap, and electrostatic actuation. Include dynamic response analysis and noise characterization.
generated_code:
VIN vin 0 DC 3.3

.AC DEC 10 1K 10G
.PROBE DC V(vin)

.END

description: Process an extremely long description with repetitive information and irrelevant details about manufacturing equipment, operator names, laboratory conditions, and project deadlines mixed with actual device specifications for a simple resistor-capacitor circuit.
generated_code:
* Comment line describing circuit
VIN vin 0 DC 3.3

* Device instances (M1, Q1, etc.) with proper node connections
R1 vin vout 10k

.AC DEC 10 1K 10G
.PROBE DC V(vout) I(VIN)
.END

description: Create a basic NMOS transistor circuit with 1μm channel length, 10μm width, operating at 3V supply voltage. Include DC operating point analysis.
generated_code:
* Comment line describing circuit
* Device name: nmos
* Instance: M1
* DC operating point analysis
* .MODEL statement with proper node connections

* Create a basic NMOS transistor circuit with 1μm channel length, 10μm width, operating at 3V supply voltage.
* Include DC operating point analysis.
M1 vd vg 0 0 nmos L=1u W=10u

.MODEL nmos NMOS(
+ LEVEL=1 VTO=0.7 KP=120u GAMMA=0.5 PHI=0.6
+ LAMBDA=0.1 RD=10 RS=10 CBD=5f CBS=5f
+ CGDO=0.4n CGSO=0.4n CGBO=0.4n)

.TRAN 1n 1u
.PROBE DC I(VDD)
.END
